Name: Emberheart Dragonrider
Story Background: In the volcanic region of Kaldheim, only the bravest knights dare to tame and ride the mighty dragons.
Ability: When Emberheart Dragonrider enters the battlefield, you may pay R. If you do, target creature gains haste until end of turn.
Appearance Description: A fearless knight adorned in fiery armor astride a majestic dragon with wings ablaze.
